description: a(n) = number of sets of consecutive primes whose arithmetic mean is A060863(n).
mathematica: f[n_]:=Block[{i=1,j,c=0,m},While[Prime[i]<=n, j=1; While[m=Sum[Prime[k],{k,i,i+j-1}]/j; If[m==n,c++ ]; m<n, j++ ]; i++ ]; c]; Select[Table[f[n],{n,160}],#>0&] (* _Ray Chandler_, Oct 03 2006 *)
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, May 08 2003
